Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.25087911]herpes simplex virus type 2(HSV-2):inhibition of viral replication in Vero cells(90% inhibition at 25 μg/mL,EC50= 18.2μg/mL).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: Subtilosin displays antiviral and virucidal actions against HSV-2. The target of subtilosin inhibitory effect would be late stages of the viral replicative cycle such as viral glycoprotein intracellular transport.

Literature.Title: Antiherpes simplex virus type 2 activity of the antimicrobial peptide subtilosin.
Literature.Author: Quintana VM, Torres NI, Wachsman MB, Sinko PJ, Castilla V, Chikindas M.
